channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-15592] Print Procedure WAL content
item.description: Let's have a printer to print the content of Procedure WAL.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Attached a patch, which I used to debug a problem trying to see the content of the Procedure WALs, with some polish.

-1 overall

can you add a toStringForDebug() or something like that?
the toString() is used in INFO and those extra info stackIndexes & co are too much

other than that looks good to me
1 after addressing Matteo's comment. Although new code, let's have this in 1.1 since it maybe useful for debugging.
Ok. Matteo Bertozzi I will update it. Thanks.

Attached a patch that addressed Matteo's comment.
Thanks.
branch 1.x patch has a minor difference: EOF is changed to PROCEDURE_WAL_EOF
+1 v2 looks good to me

This message was automatically generated.

The Hadoop QA was running the 1.2-v2 patch against the master branch. That is why the compilation failure.
As I mentioned previously, EOF in version 1.2 is changed to PROCEDURE_WAL_EOF in master.
Re-attach master-v2.

customfieldvalues.customfieldvalue:
Use hbase org.apache.hadoop.hbase.procedure2.store.wal.ProcedureWALPrettyPrinter
to print the content of a Procedure WAL.
e.g.
hbase org.apache.hadoop.hbase.procedure2.store.wal.ProcedureWALPrettyPrinter -f /hbase/MasterProcWALs/state-00000000000000002571.log
